views_handler_argument_date Class Reference

Detailed Description

Abstract argument handler for dates.

Adds an option to set a default argument based on the current date.

Parameters:
$arg_format The format string to use on the current time when creating a default date argument.
Definitions terms:
  • many to one: If true, the "many to one" helper will be used.
  • invalid input: A string to give to the user for obviously invalid input. This is deprecated in favor of argument validators.
    See also:
    views_many_to_one_helper

Member Function Documentation

views_handler_argument_date::default_argument_form ( &$  form,
&$  form_state 
)

Add an option to set the default value to the current date.

Reimplemented from views_handler_argument.

views_handler_argument_date::get_default_argument ( $  raw = FALSE  ) 

Set the empty argument value to the current date, formatted appropriately for this argument.
